text: Indian administrative divisions, as of 1951 Elections to the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly were held on 26 March 1952. 2,604 candidates contested for the 347 constituencies in the Assembly. There were 83 two-member constituencies and 264 single-member constituencies. ==Results== ==See also== *1951–52 elections in India ==References== 1952 Category:1952 State Assembly elections in India Category:March 1952 events
title: 1952 Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly election
